params._poolManager: The address of the Uniswap V4 PoolManager contract.
params._swapHook: The address of the SwapExecutorHook contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.inputToken: The token the sender wants to use.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addStablecoin(address).notice: Adds a stablecoin to the allowlist.

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with a given PoolManager address.

pay(address,uint256,address).notice: Allows users to pay others in their preferred stablecoin. Swaps if required.

poolManager().notice: Address of the Uniswap V4 PoolManager

removeStablecoin(address).notice: Removes a stablecoin from the allowlist.

setPreferredStablecoin(address).notice: Sets the user's preferred stablecoin for receiving payments.

swapHook().notice: The swap hook contract used for executing swaps
